project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV Files
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program to perform basic data analysis on a CSV file, focusing on calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to calculate mean for specified columns
Implement functionality to calculate median for specified columns
Implement functionality to calculate mode for specified columns
Write tests for CSV reading and analysis functions
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure accurate calculations
